name: Laputa: Riddles In The Sky
description:
Laputa: Riddles In The Sky

Laputa is a single-player puzzle game set amongst the clouds. Think your way through a series of brain-bending challenges and unlock the mystery of Laputa!

Controls

Use the WSAD keys or the ARROW keys to move. Use the MOUSE to interact with the world.

Note On Saved Games

Laputa uses LocalStorage to save your game. Please whitelist cookies for getpixel.itch.io in your adblocker.
